title: BABY RECOVERING AFTER GUNSHOT
content: Late Sunday afternoon Montgomery County Sheriff’s Office responded to a report of an accidental shooting on Eastridge Drive in the Legends Ranch Subdivision. The call came in from a woman who stated her husband was cleaning a gun and the child was accidently shot. MCHD also responded and found a two-year old with a bullet wound to the hand. The child was transported to Texas Children’s Hospital in the Texas Medical Center. According to Montgomery County Detectives, the child’s father had been cleaning his 9mm pistol. He became distracted and set it down. That is when the child started to handle the weapon and it went off. The child is in stable condition.
